CustomField.description: Field counts the amount of Core Client Team Members that attended the meeting (US-1414). Core Roles as at July 2016 are Manager Client Coverage,IB Champion,GM Champion,TPS Champion,Executive Sponsor, Sector/Client Coverage Head and Credit Risk
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How many Core Client Team members attended this meeting?
CustomField.label: Core Client Team Attendees

summaryFilterItems.value: Manager Client Coverage,IB Champion,GM Champion,TPS Champion,Executive Sponsor, Sector/Client Coverage Head,Credit Risk
